mapper.select: select c._date, c.state, c.update_time, t._name 'taskInfo.name', t.sponsor_id 'taskInfo.sponsor.id', t.start_time 'taskInfo.start', t.end_time 'taskInfo.end', t.s_type 'taskInfo.sponsor.type', t.room_id 'taskInfo.room.id' from tb_completion c,tb_taskinfo t where c.taskinfo_id=t._id and t.grade_id=#{grade} and #{time} between t.start_time and t.end_time and #{date}=c._date and #{checker}=t.checker_id and #{c_type}=t.c_type and #{type}=t.type

select c._date, c.state, c.update_time, t._name 'taskInfo.name', t.sponsor_id 'taskInfo.sponsor.id', t.start_time 'taskInfo.start', t.end_time 'taskInfo.end', t.s_type 'taskInfo.sponsor.type', t.checker_id 'taskInfo.checker.id', t.c_type 'taskInfo.checker.type', t.room_id 'taskInfo.room.id', t.type 'taskInfo.type' from tb_completion c,tb_taskinfo t where c._id=#{id} and t._id = c.taskinfo_id;

select c.id, t.name 'taskInfo.name', t.`sponsor.id` 'taskInfo.sponsor.id', t.`start` 'taskInfo.start', t.`end` 'taskInfo.end', t.`sponsor.type` 'taskInfo.sponsor.type', t.`checker.id` 'taskInfo.checker.id', t.`checker.type` 'taskInfo.checker.type', t.room_id 'taskInfo.room.id', t.type 'taskInfo.type' from tb_completion c,tb_taskinfo t where t.`checker.id`=#{checker.id} and t.`checker.type`=#{checker.type} and t.id = c.`taskinfo.id` and t.`grade.id`=#{grade} and (#{time} between t.start and t.end) and t.type=#{type} and #{date}=c.date ;
